OOC: sorry I've been a while in posting....

BIC:

About twenty feet from the ground Ragnus spread his wings and broke 
his fall.  Landing softly beside the downed 'bot, he looked towards 
the true battlefield.

The Decepticons were retreating.

He had arrived too late for the battle. But he could cover the 
retreat and take the downed Perceptor, be he an ally in need of 
repair, or enemy to use as a hostage.

Putting away his laser swords he transformed into his dragon form.  
Using one of his huge foreclaws he grabbed perceptor and headed 
towards the other retreating Decepticons.
